message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the price you've proposed. I would like to make a counteroffer of $850000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go below $950000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $900000. I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings to your business.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but unfortunately, my budget still doesn't allow me to reach $900000. I would like to make a counteroffer of $875000.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $925000. I'm willing to compromise and offer $885000. I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings to your business. I'm willing to meet you halfway again.
I appreciate your continued efforts to accommodate my budget, Alice. I would like to make a counteroffer of $870000.

I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $880000. I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings to your business. I'm willing to compromise again.
I understand your position, Alice, and I'm willing to consider your latest offer. However, I would like to propose an alternative at $865000.
I'm not willing to go below $890000, Bob. I think that's the lowest price I can accept and still make a reasonable profit. I'm willing to meet you at $885000. That's my final offer.
Considering our previous negotiations, I believe we're quite close. I would like to make one last offer of $875000.
